A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie looks like a starwarsy film\, but BEWARE! it´s just Disney makeup!\, beneath a flimsy holey plot lies poor and strange character development\, specially for Luke Skywalker and Kylo Ren. The movie is not well written and the pacing is off beat\, intermingling dark scenes with cheapguardiansofthegalaxy humor and a casino subplot that nothing has to do with the movie at hand.
